headline.main: ROOSEVELT FOR CHANGES; Indications at Hyde Park Are Act's Repeal Is Not Goal

lead_paragraph: HYDE PARK, N.Y., Sept. 28 -- President Roosevelt, who will take up on his return to Washington Tuesday the fight for modification or repeal of the Neutrality Act, heard the Rev. Frank R. Wilson of St. James Episcopal Church here assert, today that the United States helped to upset the world situation.
